name: Closing In On Pascal
description:
Controls:
Run - A & D - Left Stick    
Jump - Space - A
Switch -Return - B
Enter Next Level - Up - Left Stick (Up)
Jump Down - Down + Space - Down + A    

How to Play: Find the exit as fast as you can before the walls close in on you. Make sure to press Up to enter the exit.
A few levels will require a key to open the exit. If you see a switch, you can flip it with the Switch button
to expand the walls for extra time.
